full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL MGON DON LNGA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD PA'I DUS KYI THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA, MI DANG MI MIN GYI GNOD PA CHAR LTAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DI LA, , RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG KHYAD PAR RING DANG RUS SHIN TU MTHO ZHI PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG BA DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA RNAM SPYOD YANGS PA THU SHE YE GUN KHUN DI LI HUNG GI CHI RIN CHEN @005B RDO RJE DON DU, , ^SH'AKYA DGE SLONG DZNY'A NA MING CAN GYIS BRIS SO, ,BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN 'DOGS PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
